code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{FaGithub,FaLink}from'react-icons/fa';import projectData from'../data/projectdata';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProjectsSection(){const[activeProject,setActiveProject]=useState(null);const toggleDetails=id=>{setActiveProject(activeProject===id?null:id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"projects",className:"container mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:projectData.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 col-lg-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card h-100 project-card",onClick:()=>toggleDetails(item.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:item.title}),activeProject===item.id&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tech-stack",children:item.tech}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:item.github_url,className:"project-btn",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaGithub,{})," "]}),item.live_url&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:item.live_url,className:"project-btn",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaLink,{})," "]})]})]})]})})},item.id))})]});}export default ProjectsSection;
